description: Bristol Rovers manager Inigo Calderon celebrates a home victory for the first time as the Gas beat in-form Barnsley at The Memorial Stadium.
title: Bristol Rovers 3-1 Barnsley
maintext:
Bristol Rovers have won just one of their last 10 Football League games against Barnsley (D3 L6) and are winless across their last five such meetings with the Tykes (D2 L3).
Barnsley have won just one of their last 13 Football League visits to Bristol Rovers (D5 L7), enjoying a 5-1 win in the second tier in November 1992.
Bristol Rovers won their last league game, beating Cambridge 1-0, and could win successive league games for the first time since October.
Barnsley have won each of their last four league games in succession and will be looking to record five league wins in a row for the first time since December 2022.
